Question.Subject: My twitter buttons won't work?
Question.Content: Okay so when i go on twitter , it wont let me use the buttons like the follow, tweet or any of the list buttons , it was all working fine until yesterday do you think i need to download anything for it to work again or whats wrong with it :S any ideas would be great ! Also none of like chat things work like msn and if you make a chat on a site i cant see the writing and it doesnt load ! i have flash player , but it wont let me on the java script website , thats probably why its not working , it just says this request has been denied :S hmm
Question.ChosenAnswer: Look up Adobe Flash Player and install it. If that does not work look up JavaScript

Answer.Content: Look up Adobe Flash Player and install it. If that does not work look up JavaScript
